channel.title: Adding sounds and music to RSC?
channel.description: Lately I've been playing RSC with old RS2 music in the background. It brings back some memories. Wondering would putting RS2 sounds and music be into RSC be a good idea? Anyways just something to discuss what do you guys think?

item.title: Adding sounds and music to RSC?
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:7, topic:548008”]mp3 can suck my dick[/quote]++

Read full topic

item.title: Adding sounds and music to RSC?
item.dc:creator: @Aleka Aleka
item.description:
@Aleka wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:5, topic:548008”][quote author=Aleka link=topic=666914.msg4459401#msg4459401 date=1416752165]
I really miss is the pick axe noise when mining that was oddly soothing. Same with the chopping noise when you wc. What do you guys think of those noises in RSC?
[/quote]I’m not sure what your point is now…[/quote]

I hate you so much RSCShadow.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding sounds and music to RSC?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

I’ve started the process of adding taunts which plays audio on other clients in your area. Obviously if someone has the feature turned off they won’t be bothered by it. A good laugh never hurts.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f8k-yTx0Z5k

Read full topic
item.source: Adding sounds and music to RSC?

item.title: Adding sounds and music to RSC?
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

imthenull:

I wrote a new sound engine before since RSC’s is deprecated. Mine has backwards compatibility with the current engine plus new features such as the ability to play mp3 files. I might release it

That would be great. Wouldn’t mind adding some midi files in there, triggered by locations.

Read full topic
